##Wheat (Blocks 2 and 3). Ploughed: Oct 4, 1951. Seed drilled Yeoman at 3 bushels per acre with basal PK (0:13:13) - 0.15 cwtP2O5, 0.15 cwtK2O: Oct 20. N1 Nitrochalk applied at 0.3 cwtN: Apr 30, 1952. N2 Nitrochalk applied at 0.6 cwtN: Apr 30, 1952. Harvested: Aug 1.
##Potatoes (Blocks 9-12). Ploughed: Sept 7, 1951 Ploughed: Feb 7, 1952, Ridged, dung at 12 tons/acre, N1 sulphate of ammonia at 0.5 cwtN/acre, N2 sulphate of ammonia at 1.0 cwtN/acre and basal PK (0:13:13) - 0.9 cwtP2O5, 0.9 cwtK2O, potatoes planted Majestic: Apr 30. Earthed up: July 9. Sprayed with copper sulphate solution 5 1b per acre, medium volume: Aug 12 and Sept 6. Sprayed with 20% sulphuric acid: Oct 8. Lifted: Oct 16
##Barley (Blocks 5-8), Ploughed: Jan 22, 1952. Ground chalk applied to Blocks 6 and 7: Feb 28, Seed drilled Plumage Archer at 3 bushcls per acre with basal PK (0:13:13) - 0.15 cwtP2O5, 0.15 cwtK2O: Feb 29, N1 Nitro-chalk at 0.2 cwtN/acre, N2 Nitro-chalk at 0.4 cwtN/acre: Mar 1. Harvested: July 25.
##Cut Grass 1st year (Blocks 1 and 4). Ploughed: Oct 4, 1951. Basal PK (0:13:13) - 0.6 cwtP2O5, 0.6 cwtK2O: Apr 5, 1952. Seeds sown at 33 1b per acre: Apr 19. Cut: July 21, Sept 3 and Sept 27. Nitrochalk applied after each cut except the last. N1 Nitro-chalk at 0.075 cwtN/acre, N2 Nitro-chalk at 0.15 cwtN/acre: Apr 18, July 21, Sept 3
##Grazed Ley 1st year (Blocks 1 and 4). Ploughed: Oct 4, 1951. Basal PK (0:13:13) - 0.6 cwtP2O5, 0.6 cwtK2O: Apr 5, 1952. N1 Nitro-chalk at 0.15 cwtN/acre, N2 Nitro-chalk at 0.3 cwtN/acre: Apr 18, July 21, Sept 3: June 26, Grazed: 6 circuits plots 11-12, 5 circuits 45 and 46.
##Lucerne 1st year (Blocks 1 and 4). Ploughed: Oct 4, 1951. Basal PK (0:13:13) - 0.6 cwtP2O5, 0.6 cwtK2O: Apr 5, 1952. Seed drilled Du Puits at 33 1b per acre: Apr 19. Cut July 21 and Sept 11.
